name: Select Schedule
get
info:
This node get the config of selected shedule item.
Node input comes from selected shedule item ui template.
Output is passed to shedule item template.

name: create
info: Click this to create the schedule

name: Scheduler
info:
This node runs every x secs
I schedule item needs to be enabled, selected for a given day, hour & min.
It will not run Ban on the selected min but with-in a min value.
Eg anywhere from 21 min 0 sec to 59 sec

name: run @30s
info:
runs the sheduler every x Secs
default is 30 secs

name: Schedule Item
update
info: persists changes to a shedule item.

name: reset
info:
This resets the scheduler state.
So if your testing and want to re-run a schedule item. Click this.
